testcase.name: Authentication & Security (Hybrid Local-Cloud) › User Registration › should reject registration with weak password
Authentication & Security (Hybrid Local-Cloud) › User Registration › should reject registration with mismatched passwords
Authentication & Security (Hybrid Local-Cloud) › User Registration › should reject duplicate email registration
Authentication & Security (Hybrid Local-Cloud) › User Login › should login with valid credentials

Authentication & Security (Hybrid Local-Cloud) › Password Reset › should validate password reset token expiry with production settings

Authentication & Security (Hybrid Local-Cloud) › Session Management › should logout successfully

Authentication & Security (Hybrid Local-Cloud) › Session Management › should handle expired JWT tokens
